languages.text: {n}Тревоги, заботы, лишения — им нет места в новопровозглашенном царстве умиротворения. Есть лишь бескрайняя толща невесомости, в которой дрейфует очищенный от шелухи разум то{mf|го|й}, кто зовет себя {name} фон Валанциус.{/n}

{n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тревоги, заботы, лишения — им нет места в новопровозглашенном царстве умиротворения. Есть лишь бескрайняя толща невесомости, в которой дрейфует очищенный от шелухи разум то{mf|го|й}, кто зовет себя {name} фон Валанциус.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Troubles, worries, losses — they do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, drifts the mind of {mf|he|she} who calls {mf|himself|herself} {name} von Valancius.{/n}

{n}Troubles, worries, losses — they do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, drifts the mind of {mf|he|she} who calls {mf|himself|herself} {name} von Valancius.{/n}

{n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}

{n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}

{n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}

{n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les problèmes, les inquiétudes, les déconvenues... Ces préoccupations n'ont pas leur place dans le havre de tranquillité que vous venez d'établir. Seules restent ces eaux infinies où votre esprit, libéré de ses fardeaux et de toutes choses superficielles, flotte dans une félicité silencieuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les problèmes, les inquiétudes, les déconvenues... Ces préoccupations n'ont pas leur place dans le havre de tranquillité que vous venez d'établir. Seules restent ces eaux infinies où votre esprit, libéré de ses fardeaux et de toutes choses superficielles, flotte dans une félicité silencieuse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Problemas, preocupaciones, pérdidas... nada de eso tiene cabida en este nuevo dominio de la tranquilidad. Solo hay aguas infinitas de ingravidez en las que, liberada de todo lo superficial, la mente de {name} von Valancius se queda a la deriva, en feliz calma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Problemas, preocupaciones, pérdidas... nada de eso tiene cabida en este nuevo dominio de la tranquilidad. Solo hay aguas infinitas de ingravidez en las que, liberada de todo lo superficial, la mente de {name} von Valancius se queda a la deriva, en feliz calma.{/n}

languages.text: {n}烦恼、忧虑、失落……负面情绪在这个宁静的王国中没有任何落脚之地。这里只有无尽的水，带给你如同失重的感觉。在这里，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯的心灵在沉静的至福中随波逐流，不再被任何肤浅之物所束缚。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}烦恼、忧虑、失落……负面情绪在这个宁静的王国中没有任何落脚之地。这里只有无尽的水，带给你如同失重的感觉。在这里，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯的心灵在沉静的至福中随波逐流，不再被任何肤浅之物所束缚。{/n}

languages.text: {n}悩み、心配事、喪失感…そのようなものは、この新しく確立された静寂の支配には属さない。そこにあるのは、無重力の無限の水だけである。表面的なものをすべて取り除かれた{name}フォン・ヴァランシウスの心は、静かな至福の中に漂っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}悩み、心配事、喪失感…そのようなものは、この新しく確立された静寂の支配には属さない。そこにあるのは、無重力の無限の水だけである。表面的なものをすべて取り除かれた{name}フォン・ヴァランシウスの心は、静かな至福の中に漂っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sorgen, Ängste, Verlust ... all das hat in diesem neu begründeten Reich der Ruhe keinen Platz. Es existiert nur noch das endlose Wasser der Schwerelosigkeit, in dem der Verstand von {name} von Valancius, von allen oberflächlichen Dingen befreit, in stiller Glückseligkeit treibt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgen, Ängste, Verlust ... all das hat in diesem neu begründeten Reich der Ruhe keinen Platz. Es existiert nur noch das endlose Wasser der Schwerelosigkeit, in dem der Verstand von {name} von Valancius, von allen oberflächlichen Dingen befreit, in stiller Glückseligkeit treibt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sorunlar, endişeler, kayıplar... Bu yeni kurulmuş sükûnet diyarında bu tür şeylere yer yok. Burada yalnızca sonsuz suların ağırlıksızlığı var ve {name} von Valancius'un her türlü önemsiz şeyden azade olan zihni, bu suların içinde sessiz bir huzura akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Troubles, worries, loss — such things do not belong in this newly established dominion of tranquillity. There are only the infinite waters of weightlessness, in which, stripped of all things superficial, the mind of {name} von Valancius drifts in silent bliss.{/n}
